data.title: Rebekah Etheridge Denton
data.text:
Notes for Rebekah Etheridge Denton

Notes from Find-A-Grave: She was the daughter of Samuel Denton and Margaret Moore. She married Benjamin F. Chastain on January 30, 1798, in Pendleton District, South Carolina. Their children were Mary, born May 3, 1801, in Pendleton District, South Carolina; Jonathan Davis, born May 22, 1803, in Pendleton District, South Carolina; Jeremiah, born March 28, 1805, in Pendleton District, South Carolina; John Bunyan, born February 20, 1807, in Pendleton District, South Carolina; Benjamin Franklin, born May 16, 1809, in Pendleton District, South Carolina; Nancy, born June 13, 1811, in Pendleton District, South Carolina; Elijah Webb, born September 25, 1813, in Pickens County, South Carolina; Rebecca Denton, born March 18, 1816, in Pickens County, South Carolina; Jemimah, born June 10, 1818, in Habersham County, Georgia; and Martha Denton, born June 16, 1821, in Habersham County, Georgia

Research notes for Rebekah Etheridge Denton

Rebekah was married by her brother, Rev. Jonathan Chastain.

Notes for Benjamin F. (Spouse 1)
